Title: Getaway
Writer: Taku Kishimoto (composition), Kei Sambe (manga), Alexander Von David (english script), Yutaka Yasunaga (screenplay)
Actors: Ryan Bartley, Christine Marie Cabanos, David W. Collins, Sara Cravens
Plot: After learning his efforts were in vain Satoru is transported back to 2006 in the midst of the manhunt for him and ends up placing his closest ally in danger.
